responses.text: Murr hurr mphuphurrur, hurr mph phrr.
Murr hurr mphuphurrur, hurr mph phrr.
Murr hurr mphuphurrur, hurr mph phrr.
Mrh! Hrt hr nha phrnt yrh mrprph!
Yah fuddah gon den dey fhumah!
Mumuno, muh bumuno! (Pactum diabolus! and Mortis animataris!)
Cuhts me trihp! (Deus invictus! and Barpo kabalto!)
Muhk niphurr! (Ipsum instanterium! and Seismela tremoro!)

commands.text: Mrh! Hrt hr nha phrnt yrh mrprph!
Mhhph mh mh mhhp mh mhp mhpph mhhpp!

taunts.text: Woo hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo!
Woo hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
